Header: 58 Division's New Conference Hall Vested in All Ranks
Content: Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Commander Security Forces - West as the Chief Guest on Tuesday (12) opened the 58 Division's newly-erected conference hall in the premises during a simple ceremony at the invitation of Major General Sudath Perera, General Officer Commanding 58 Division. A brief religious ceremony blessed the project before the Chief Guest unveiled a plaque and opened it. The day's Chief Guest was received in a Guard Turnout before he was conducted to the location.
